title: I'd like to buy several T206 Magee portraits
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: I'd like to buy several T206 Magee portraits
posts.post_content: Looking to buy several T206 Magee portraits willing to pay strong prices.  Ideally looking for psa 3 - 6+ or similarity graded sgc's.    Pm's or email to [url]kardboys@yahoo.com[/url]

Robert---

I have a very nice looking, clean raw one, but it does have 2 very thin creases across the surface. Any interest in one like that?
Appreciate the offer but right now only looking for graded copies.  Thanks though.
Bump, have bot a few (thanks guys) looking for a few more.
